explanation: [0-0] In a lush green meadow, several tall plants are scattered around. The background is a brown stepped earth block, with white clouds floating in the blue sky.

[0-6] Then, a cute khaki rabbit appears on the grass with two red hearts floating above its head, one of which is half full. The scene switches to a snow-covered hillside where a villager in blue, gold, and red clothes stands. A row of red hearts floats overhead. Afterward, a white wolf appears on the snow, also with a row and a half of red hearts floating above its head. Later, the scene shifts to the underwater world, where some green grass grows on the greyish seabed, and a beige creature with multiple tentacles appears. It has four rows of red hearts above its head.
